job.title: Software Engineer (Remote)
job.industry: Computer Software,Information Technology and Services,Computer & Network Security
job.description: braintree lets you move money from one place to another safely and securely every time you pay for an uber ride book a stay through airbnb or pay with paypal when you check out online youre using our product it sounds complex and it is but we make it so simple you cant tell were thereltbrgtltbrgtwe solve worldscale problems and provide opportunities to match we build diverse teams that recognize our strengths and allow us to work on our weaknesses you bring skills and a relentless focus on the customer and well provide the support you need to do the best work of your lifeltbrgtltbrgtcheck us out github blog twitter linkedin facebook the muse glassdoor product and tech blogltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtthe engineering teamltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtour focus is teaming with smart engineers who are passionate about their craft and excited to build software for our unique solutions in the spaceltbrgtltbrgtat braintree developers have the chance to work on various teams and stacks although much of our platform software is written in ruby we believe in using the best tool for the job for example weve written data platforms in clojure payment gateways in java and contextual commerce in pythonltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtheres moreltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtcommunication is key to our process and we dont want to hinder it with walls many teams program in pairs which means you always have another set of eyes to help youltligtltligtwe practice testdriven development and believe that it helps us deliver simple solutions focused on real customer needsltligtltligtwe keep the team in sync with daily standups and have regular retrospectives to discuss things that are going well and opportunities for improvementsltligtltligtwe value unique perspectives brought by diverse backgrounds and experiences a broad range of ideas and perspectives help us to create the best possible productltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtjob description summaryltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtthe braintree sdk team is looking for a software developer to help us develop and maintain the tools merchants use to integrate with paypal the team handles client sdks iosandroidjs server libraries and backend services that help them run usability is our core mission we build to unobtrusively live within our merchants codebases and take their payments experiences to the vanguard of emerging technology and trends we value repeatabilitywe release welldocumented tools that work just as well years from now as they do todayltbrgtltbrgtas a software engineer on the sdk team youll work on developing and maintaining the server libraries merchants use to integrate with paypal ampamp braintree that involves writing new code for server libraries as well as working on our current sdks since we rotate pairs frequently there will be opportunities to learn from ampamp teach teammates working on the client sdks tooltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugttypes of projects we work onltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtsdks server youll work on developing and maintaining the server sdks merchants use to integrate with paypal ampamp braintree this means that on a given day you may find yourself working in ruby python java c net javascript nodejs and more since we rotate pairs regularly youll also get the opportunity to work on our clientside sdks and other projects we maintainltbrgtltbrgtbraintrees core values ask why care a lot solve together drive our work and interactions we ask hard questions we support each other and we team up to solve tricky problems and at the end of the day we close our computers and disconnectltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtwhat we look for in youltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt years experience building software or web applications doesnt matter what language just a focus on writing clean well designed and scalable codeltligtltligtan interest and comfort in working in a distributed team weve been spread out for as long as anyone can remember with folks who are fully remote as well as several based in our chicago and san francisco offices when they open up postcovidltligtltligtability and desire to work in our collaborative environment pair programming and regular crossteam problem solving with all products and operations teamsltligtltligta commitment to documentation including interest or experience in docsdriven developmentltligtltligtenthusiasm for pragmatic testing valuing thorough tests more than total coverage experience using a test heavy approach to solve problems and create solutionsltligtltligtfocus on building solutions utilizing an agile approach close relationships with product managers communicating and digesting real time feedback and working smart to build story cards on daily basisltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtperksltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtopen dev days every two weeks we spend a day working on projects that interest us and help us expand our skills and knowledgeltligtltligtparticipation in the technology community we help cover travel and attendance costs for conferences and we offer opportunities and tools for speakingltligtltligtcheck out our careers page for more company perksltbrgtltligtltulgtwe know the confidence gap and imposter syndrome can get in the way of meeting spectacular candidates please dont hesitate to apply you can also check out our faq
